Valor: To help me with the monetary cost of maintaining this website, I have developed a series of perks for users who support me through Patreon. If you want to access the perks, you must pay the lowest tier each month.
Advantages of paying monthly on Patreon
You can freely browse the website without affiliates being embedded in the links to deals, bundles or free games.
If you visit the website every day you will get coins that you can exchange for Steam games.
